verbose_text: Although Kindlin-1 knockdown yielded no obvious changes in integrin beta1 protein expression (XREF_FIG), reduced integrin beta1 activation [integrin beta1 (ac)] was observed in the EGF 0 h group, approximately 36% (XREF_FIG, lane 3 vs. lane 2); a greater reduction was observed in the EGF 24 h group, an approximately 58% decrease when compared to the control shRNA group (XREF_FIG, lane 6 vs. lane 5).
